Standalone Ubuntu 20.04

Prerequisites for the User

For the user who is working on the Standalone Ubuntu which is already installed in the system, the procedure is similar as that mentioned from section: Opening a Terminal to Download and Test Provided Sample Application.

However, skip steps from Figure 20 onwards which are not supported.
